name: Muvee autoProducer 6 Project File
summary: Learn about .MVEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Even though autoProducer 6 is no longer offered, Reveal X can still open MVEX project files.

description: Movie project created by muvee autoProducer, a home video making program that has now been discontinued and replaced by muvee Reveal X; saves references to audio and video clips and includes information about transitions.
